scriptTagBanner.title: ScriptTag Deprecation Timeline (Product Education)
scriptTagBanner.content: ScriptTag capabilities on Thank you / Order status pages are related to the {{date}} (Plus merchants) deprecation (from Shopify 2025-01 announcement). It is recommended to use the Migration Checklist on the 'Audit' page and the Verification Report on the 'Verification' page to complete the migration and ensure smooth tracking transition.

scriptTagMigrationBanner.title: Detected {{count}} ScriptTags needing migration
scriptTagMigrationBanner.orderStatusWarning: ⚠️ Detected Order Status Page ScriptTag, which is the main target of Shopify's deprecation announcement. Please migrate to Web Pixel ASAP to avoid tracking interruption.
scriptTagMigrationBanner.step1: 1. Enable Tracking Guardian Web Pixel on 'Migration' page
scriptTagMigrationBanner.step2: 2. Complete test order and verify event receipts and parameter completeness on 'Verification' page
scriptTagMigrationBanner.step3: 3. Manually delete old ScriptTags in Shopify Admin
scriptTagMigrationBanner.step3Sub: (Go to 'Settings -> Apps and sales channels', find the app that created the ScriptTag and uninstall it)

migrationDeadlineBanner.title: Important Migration Deadlines
migrationDeadlineBanner.disclaimer: Important: The following dates are from Shopify official announcements for reference only. Please refer to Shopify Admin for actual deadlines. Shopify may update policies, we recommend checking Shopify official documentation regularly.
migrationDeadlineBanner.plusMerchant: Plus Merchants: Restrictions start {{date1}} (ScriptTag execution stops; Additional Scripts enter read-only mode (uneditable, PII inaccessible), key milestone: upgrade/restriction starts), auto-upgrade starts {{date2}} (legacy customizations will be lost). Refer to <1>Shopify Help Center
migrationDeadlineBanner.nonPlusMerchant: Non-Plus Merchants: Deadline {{date}}. Refer to <1>Shopify Help Center
migrationDeadlineBanner.footer: checkout.liquid, Additional Scripts, and ScriptTags will be phased out, early migration to Web Pixels is recommended
